Reviews.Title: Nice phone!
Reviews.Author: jeannie friehauf
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my HTC my Touch 4G Mobile Phone. It works well. The seller met my needs. When I wasn't satisfied with the first phone I received, another one came within 2 days. It is great.

Reviews.Title: Declined performance over time
Reviews.Author: Eno4G
Reviews.Content: This thing was great when I first got it. Easy to use and decent apps. Over the last year it has progressively gotten slower. Phone reception non-existent. Frequent fatal crashes. Yesterday the phone just stopped responding. I gave it an assisted retirement, so I'm going to need a phone without a shattered screen and bent case. Total, it lasted 3 years which is not too bad.

Reviews.Title: htc
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Defective phone back piece did stay attached, so battery kept falling out. After a week or so of this happening, phone no longer would turn on. Returned phone for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Great for a first timer.
Reviews.Author: Celia "Loved reading books as a child instead...
Reviews.Content: I finally decided to upgrade from my Nokia  6230I that I have had for the past 6yrs. Since it is used, it came with a few scratches which can be covered up with a case, so no worries there. Problem area was making and receiving calls. Screen would go blank so u cannot see to end call or anything. After searching on Web for solution, found out the screen protector was blocking the proximity sensor. Problem solved. Loving my new phone and downloading apps. There really is an app for everything. Who knew!:-)

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Hannah Borges
Reviews.Content: My son is pleased with his phone. For awhile the pictures on the screen would come up upside down, but it's something that happens intermittenly

Reviews.Title: TMOBILE MYTOUCH 4G
Reviews.Author: casey getchell
Reviews.Content: UUGGGHHHH!!!! SO THE PHONE WAS IN GREAT SHAPE.. NO SCRATCHES, BUT THE BATTERY HAD WATER DAMAGE AND THE BATTERY WOULDN'T KEEP A CHARGE FOR MORE THAN 10 MINUTES.. I HAD TO ORDER  NEW BATTERY FOR IT!!

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth buying!
Reviews.Author: swimguppy
Reviews.Content: I've been looking for a new phone to replace my old one and use it as an mp3 player. But I really didnt want to spend a ton of money on all the newer android phones. After my friend bought her's and told me about it, it fit exactly all the things I wanted in a phone. It was cheap, semi-compact yet sturdy, good text touch screen with swype, and an awesome media player that not only holds music but videos. I definitely recommend this phone to anyone who wants a high powered android phone, but at a more reasonable price. I bought this used- like new and it was even cheaper than it already was. The only problem with the appearance is one tiny scratch on the edge but it was easily covered with the case that came with it. Overall I definitely recommend this phone. Hoped this help :)

Reviews.Title: never received phone waited a month for refund,
Reviews.Author: rhmf67
Reviews.Content: I had to give one star to write this and I guess after finally receiving refund  that was the only good thing.  Be very careful some of the sellers are not very well researched before being allowed to sell and are criminals.  First time this expert happened to us, usually all good.

Reviews.Title: ft mama
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Ft mama lived up to my expectations!The phone works/looks great.Smart phoneHTC my touch t mobileGreat phoneBetter than I phone

Reviews.Title: Shipped Fast
Reviews.Author: Enbedded linux
Reviews.Content: Works perfect. came with two sets of ear buds, but no Usb. Still a great value. 4g works great. It was here in 4 days. nice! Happy so far. Pretty freaking great for under 200.00 smackers.

Reviews.Title: Love my phone!
Reviews.Author: Amity P
Reviews.Content: Ordered an HTC my touch 4G, it was described as black, but the back is actually a dark purple (it was a nice surprise for me, that may not be so nice for a guy...) But overall I really like my phone, and will be sure to order from this company again!

Reviews.Title: Can't trust anymore
Reviews.Author: Fadii
Reviews.Content: I bought a (my touch 4G) and I asked for warranty and the seller told me yes the phone have warranty but after I bought the phone I figured out after a month when the phone got a software problem that there's no warranty and I couldn't even return it because it's passed a month. So I had to fix the phone in my owen. It's a bad phone from a bad seller.

Reviews.Title: boo
Reviews.Author: latisha
Reviews.Content: Wish I knew the camera didnt work. It was a cheap phone so I got what i paid for I guess

Reviews.Title: This is the worst phone ever!!!!!
Reviews.Author: jennifer
Reviews.Content: I went through 5 of these phones until they stopped making this model. Does not have service anywhere is seriously the worst phone ever. This phone is not worth paying for.

Reviews.Title: defective phone shipped
Reviews.Author: Ed Kay
Reviews.Content: received defective phone no brightness setting too dark to read,,expected another one or credit after waiting a week nothingneeded the phone for work had to go out and buy another one

Reviews.Title: Hukisome 4G phone ^_^ Love it!
Reviews.Author: love huki
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and works hukisome [100x better than awesome]. Very satisfied with product. I will certainly be ordering more phones from this distributor real soon since I buy phones to give away to help those who have no phones.

Reviews.Title: everything but play
Reviews.Author: SifuRyder263
Reviews.Content: I actually had this phone before and had a t-mobile account untill I lost them.  Both the account and the phone.  So I bought the exact same one and I love it just the same except for one thing.  I cant download through playstore.  I contacted the manufacturers and went through about an hour of trouble shooting they told me the phone must be rooted and there is nothing they can do.  I still have not been able to get playstore, but I love the phone anyway.

Reviews.Title: Came in Great Condition
Reviews.Author: Lilly
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone by mistake, not ashamed to admit itThe seller was more than happy enough to help me return or exchange it for a new phone.i ended up keeping it and giving it to my younger sister.It was delivered on time and in great condition.

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: Dominique K. Restagno "Dominique"
Reviews.Content: great seller (bestprice_com)bought this phone "used-like new"I've had this phone for about a month now and so far so good.  I have no complaints.-the camera works great-the genius button (voice control) works great-fast internet-swipe and speak text makes texting easy and fastI recommend this phone =)

Reviews.Title: what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Lucille M. Smith
Reviews.Content: what I was looking for I liked it for the short time that I had it I lost it not very long after I got itcan't afford another one yet

FREE CASE AND PROTECTOR
Fast shipping!
